name: Willie’s Waterworks
overview: A PipeDream\PipeMania clone created by Omega Demos and released in 1992. Can you help Willie control his waterworks To do so you must prevent the water from escaping by placing differently shaped pipes on the playing area. The number of pipes needed to hold the water is shown in the pipe counter and when this reaches zero you have completed the level. You can carry on laying pipes for as long as you like to get a bigger score. Hazards appear on later levels to hamper your progress which can range from Broken Squares to one-way pipes and End Pipes of two types. One that is optional and one that is required to pass the level.
